article_title: 'Independent' Contractors--And Many That Aren't--Shape Work Today

article_metadata.description: Having employees triggers a litany of federal and state tax withholding. Employees mean a host of anti-discrimination, health care, pension, worker’s compensation and unemployment insurance obligations. You avoid these entanglements by hiring independent contractors, or do you? If they are really independent contractors, sure, but labels aren’t enough. Disputes are [...]
article_metadata.author: Robert W. Wood
